channel.title: HELP! java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 :(
channel.description:
Hello, i am adding Dungeoneering to my PI source, i get 0 errors in compiler, but when i run server it shows this error:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:365) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Any ideas what it could be please? as i havent changed anything in ItemHandler or Server.java :confused:
Any help will be VERY much appreciated :D
Thanks in advance :)

item.title: HELP! java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 :(
item.dc:creator: @Fluoxetine Fluoxetine
item.description:
@Fluoxetine wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:5, topic:411655”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=512907.msg3723279#msg3723279 date=1314096580]
Yeah and that, hehe. Should of mentioned about spaces as well. It’s so easy to make mistakes, even if you know what you’re doing.
[/quote]

I used to get that error a lot. Has anyone used excel files instead of configs? I would think that they would be a lot better to use, any easy to code API’s?[/quote]

API’s?

Read full topic

@whackatre wrote:

Mendorphins:

Yeah and that, hehe. Should of mentioned about spaces as well. It’s so easy to make mistakes, even if you know what you’re doing.

I used to get that error a lot. Has anyone used excel files instead of configs? I would think that they would be a lot better to use, any easy to code API’s?

item.title: HELP! java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 :(
item.dc:creator: @Fluoxetine Fluoxetine
item.description:
@Fluoxetine wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:2, topic:411655”]If you’re using arrays then check that you haven’t missed a number. This can happen sometimes when editing shops and drops in MySQL/.cfg files too.

The 6 usually means the 6th int. If it’s stating something to do with item handler then have you accidently done something in your items.cfg? Have fun checking if you can’t remember the last thing you edited.[/quote]

If you didnt have full Rep i would ++ you

TY SO MUCH!
i changed a few items and put spaces instead of TABs lol xD
Thanks again

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 :(
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

If you’re using arrays then check that you haven’t missed a number. This can happen sometimes when editing shops and drops in MySQL/.cfg files too.

The 6 usually means the 6th int. If it’s stating something to do with item handler then have you accidently done something in your items.cfg? Have fun checking if you can’t remember the last thing you edited.

Read full topic
